LikeEscapeChar

Character used to escape wildcards in patterns passed to SQL LIKE clauses. Defaults to a backslash but can be overridden by providers with different escaping semantics.

ApplyPaging(OptimizedSqlBuilder, int?, int?, string?, string?)

Applies provider-specific paging clauses to the supplied SQL builder.

Declaration
public abstract void ApplyPaging(OptimizedSqlBuilder sb, int? limit, int? offset, string? limitParameterName, string? offsetParameterName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
OptimizedSqlBuilder sb

The builder containing the base SQL statement.
int? limit

The maximum number of rows to return.
int? offset

The number of rows to skip before starting to return rows.
string limitParameterName

The parameter name used for the limit value.
string offsetParameterName

The parameter name used for the offset value.

BuildContainsClause(DbCommand, string, IReadOnlyList<object?>)

Builds an SQL IN clause for the specified column and parameter values. Each value is added as a parameter to the provided command to guard against SQL injection.

Declaration
public virtual string BuildContainsClause(DbCommand cmd, string columnName, IReadOnlyList<object?> values)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DbCommand cmd

The command that will execute the generated SQL.
string columnName

Column to apply the IN filter to.
IReadOnlyList<object> values

Values to include in the IN list.
Returns
Type Description
string

SQL fragment representing the IN clause.

BuildSimpleSelect(Span<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, out int)

Constructs a minimal SELECT statement directly into the provided character buffer to avoid intermediate string allocations.

Declaration
public virtual void BuildSimpleSelect(Span<char> buffer, ReadOnlySpan<char> table, ReadOnlySpan<char> columns, out int length)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Span<char> buffer

Destination buffer that receives the generated SQL.
ReadOnlySpan<char> table

Name of the table to select from.
ReadOnlySpan<char> columns

Comma separated list of columns to select.
int length

Outputs the number of characters written to the buffer.
| Edit this page View Source

BuildSimpleSelectSlow(Span<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>)

Fallback implementation of BuildSimpleSelect(Span<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, out int) that uses string concatenation. Providers can override BuildSimpleSelect(Span<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, ReadOnlySpan<char>, out int) to supply more efficient implementations.

Declaration
protected virtual int BuildSimpleSelectSlow(Span<char> buffer, ReadOnlySpan<char> table, ReadOnlySpan<char> columns)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Span<char> buffer
ReadOnlySpan<char> table
ReadOnlySpan<char> columns
Returns
Type Description
int
| Edit this page View Source

CreateSavepointAsync(DbTransaction, string, CancellationToken)

Creates a database savepoint within the given transaction. The default implementation throws as savepoints are provider specific and may not be supported.

Declaration

Type Name Description

CancellationToken ct

IsAvailableAsync()

Determines whether the provider can operate in the current environment. The base implementation simply returns true but derived providers may perform runtime checks for required assemblies or database availability.

Declaration
public virtual Task<bool> IsAvailableAsync()
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>
